text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
Fuji Kiseki takes first place in the Arima<n>Kinen,
and the stands ring with resonant<n>cheers and
applause!

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She's overcome with emotion but has<n>managed to
show her audience a<n>beautiful dream. She bows
respectfully<n>to them and promises that her
miracle<n>will go on.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
She has fulfilled her goal of becoming<n>the
greatest entertainer ever. She's<n>found real
confidence and the path she's<n>meant to take.

text_block_list.name: Monologue
text_block_list.text:
The curtains close on Fuji Kiseki's show,<n>but the
end is merely another beginning.<n>The start of her
next show will come<n>sooner than we know...
